front.title: A YANG model to manage the optical parameters for in a WDM network

abstract.t: This memo defines a Yang model that translate the information model to support Impairment-Aware (IA) Routing and Wavelength Assignment (RWA) functionality. The information model is defined in draft-ietf- ccamp-wson-iv-info and draft-martinelli-ccamp-wson-iv-encode. This document defines proper encoding and extend to the models defined in draft-lee-ccamp-wson-yang tu support Impairment-Aware (IA) Routing and Wavelength Assignment (RWA) functions The Yang model defined in this memo can be used for Optical Parameters monitoring and/or configuration of the multivendor Endpoints and ROADMs
